title: ARAM pool party buddies!
body:
Looking for buddies to play quick **ARAM games** together for the rewards :)
Please add me and comment your in game name on this thread so we can see who's keen for matches!

See you on the fields
{{champion:86}} DEMACIA!!

replies.body: Send me an add, I'll be on for a while.

OK GUYS!
So far we have **FIFTEEN** people keen on ARAMs for pool party rewards in total from this thread and ParisfujaMC's thread for ARAMs as well.
Feel free to add any of these well mannered summoners for your games
TheRoyale
ParisfujaMC
Papoose
SkrunchyBiscuit
Vemzz
turkleton88
Wildesy
Shadow171
ME3KS
ricetonight
StrampY
FatNinja12345
SaLo
PIexcity
Lozzathezergling
Aladdin
Currently logging in again if anyone's keen on a ARAM :3
Anyone looking for an extra person, add me, my ign is Wildesy
I'm in for a pool party, IGN is Shadow171.
Hey me and my mate KennyK6 are up for a quick game. ign Me3ks
Im up for some aram, ign is ricetonight

Hey guys, the amount of guys keen on this is amazing. We're on our second game atm which has filled up really quickly so if you're looking for a game add the other members here as well. They're pretty legit :)

{{champion:5}} Be a man
im down for aram ign is StrampY

We have our first ARAM. Remember to drop your name here for further ARAM games
{{champion:133}} Squaaaaaaawk!

Still need 2 more for our first ARAM game :)
Now's a good time

Woaaaah! Hello League community! Lots of interested people! I've got 7 invites so far so that's great. Make sure if you wanna have ARAM pool parties of your own that you can add each other by leaving a comment here too :)

{{champion:107}} TONIGHT! We hunt! For party points

yo dude added u

Lozzathezergling

I play aram and keen for next game with u. =D
